meanings.definition: Relating to or using only the seven tones of a standard major or minor scale without chromatic alterations.
meanings.sent1: The song followed a diatonic pattern, sticking to the basic notes of the scale.
meanings.sent2: The diatonic melody flowed smoothly, without any unexpected sharp or flat notes.
meanings.sent3: The diatonic tune was so simple that even a beginner could play it perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her voice danced along the diatonic scale, hitting each note with precision.
meanings.sent5: The diatonic harmony created a peaceful atmosphere, like a gentle breeze on a sunny day.
